Description:
Developing MEP Moduler production plan, material receipt schedule, and module delivery schedule based on MEP contractor’s work completion program
Handling day to day operations between client and factory pertaining to production of MEP modules and ducts and generating KPI’s
Conduct coordination meetings with MEP contractor- design team. Supervising BIM team to produce 3-D coordinated models.
Reviewing tender drawings, specifications to conduct project specific feasibility studies for implementation of MEP modules outlining scope of works and generating quotation
Business development and careering out complete production cycle of MEP modules, prefabricated assemblies and pre-insulated ducts.
To highlight the MEP contractors/ MEP consultants regarding the advantages and benefits of adopting prefabricated MEP modular systemSkills
Skills:
Good in MEP Coordination
Knowledge of Revit/FABCAD/AUTOCAD
Knowledge of Staad-PRO
